===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -0,0 +1,229 @@
+{
+  "sections": {
+    "programmes": [
+      {
+        "id": "pain-management",
+        "heading": "Pain Management Program",
+        "paragraph": "Personalized solutions to relieve chronic and acute pain, helping you return to an active lifestyle, whether it’s playing cricket or enjoying daily activities.",
+        "imageUrl": "/pain4.png",
+        "linkText": "DISCOVER MORE"
+      },
+      {
+        "id": "strength-enhancement",
+        "heading": "Strength Enhancement Program",
+        "paragraph": "Build explosive power and resilience for sports like kabaddi, cricket, or your fitness goals.",
+        "imageUrl": "/pain2.png",
+        "linkText": "DISCOVER MORE"
+      },
+      {
+        "id": "athlete-development",
+        "heading": "Athlete Development Program",
+        "paragraph": "Nurture your talent and dominate in sports like badminton, athletics, or marathons.",
+        "imageUrl": "/pain6.png",
+        "linkText": "DISCOVER MORE"
+      },
+      {
+        "id": "team-athlete",
+        "heading": "Team Athlete Development Program",
+        "paragraph": "Elevate your team’s performance with training tailored for cricket, kabaddi, or football.",
+        "imageUrl": "/pain.png",
+        "linkText": "DISCOVER MORE"
+      },
+      {
+        "id": "rehab-membership",
+        "heading": "Rehab Membership",
+        "paragraph": "Daily access to world-class facilities to accelerate recovery and get you back to peak performance.",
+        "imageUrl": "/rehab-membership.png",
+        "linkText": "DISCOVER MORE"
+      },
+      {
+        "id": "elevate-program",
+        "heading": "Elevate Programme",
+        "paragraph": "World-class support to help athletes and fitness enthusiasts achieve their dreams, from cricket pitches to gym floors.",
+        "imageUrl": "/elevate-program.png",
+        "linkText": "DISCOVER MORE"
+      }
+    ],
+    "programDetails": {
+      "rehabilitation-program": {
+        "id": "rehabilitation-program",
+        "title": "Rehabilitation Programme",
+        "description": [
+          "Recover stronger with our world-class physiotherapy and rehabilitation programme, designed for individuals of all ages healing from injuries or surgeries.",
+          "Inspired by the resilience of Indian athletes, our expert team uses cutting-edge techniques to help you return to sports like cricket or daily activities with confidence."
+        ],
+        "price": {
+          "label": "PRICE",
+          "value": "£POA (Price on Application)"
+        },
+        "details": {
+          "label": "WHAT’S INCLUDED",
+          "paragraphs": [
+            "Personalized recovery plans crafted in collaboration with leading surgeons and healthcare providers to ensure optimal outcomes.",
+            "Ideal for post-surgical recovery or managing injuries from sports like kabaddi, cricket, or daily activities, focusing on restoring strength, mobility, and performance.",
+            "Begin your journey with an initial physiotherapy assessment to create a tailored roadmap to recovery."
+          ]
+        },
+        "idealFor": {
+          "label": "IDEAL FOR",
+          "description": "Individuals recovering from injuries or surgeries, aiming to return to sports, fitness, or an active lifestyle."
+        }
+      },
+      "pain-management": {
+        "id": "pain-management",
+        "title": "Pain Management Program",
+        "description": [
+          "Find relief from chronic and acute pain with personalized solutions designed to restore your active lifestyle, whether you’re a weekend cricketer or a fitness enthusiast."
+        ],
+        "price": {
+          "label": "PRICE",
+          "value": "£POA"
+        },
+        "details": {
+          "label": "WHAT’S INCLUDED",
+          "paragraphs": [
+            "Combines advanced diagnostics, hands-on therapy, and minimally invasive techniques to relieve pain and improve mobility.",
+            "Tailored for individuals seeking to manage pain from sports injuries, work-related stress, or chronic conditions, helping you stay active and pain-free."
+          ]
+        },
+        "idealFor": {
+          "label": "IDEAL FOR",
+          "description": "Anyone seeking relief from pain to enjoy sports, fitness, or daily life without limitations."
+        }
+      },
+      "strength-enhancement": {
+        "id": "strength-enhancement",
+        "title": "Strength Enhancement Program",
+        "description": [
+          "Build power and resilience to dominate in sports like cricket, kabaddi, or your personal fitness goals with our expert-led programme."
+        ],
+        "price": {
+          "label": "PRICE",
+          "value": "£POA"
+        },
+        "details": {
+          "label": "WHAT’S INCLUDED",
+          "paragraphs": [
+            "Features resistance training, functional workouts, and sport-specific drills to enhance strength and performance.",
+            "Perfect for athletes aiming to improve batting power, sprint speed, or gym performance, with coaching tailored to your goals."
+          ]
+        },
+        "idealFor": {
+          "label": "IDEAL FOR",
+          "description": "Athletes and fitness enthusiasts looking to boost strength and performance in sports or daily activities."
+        }
+      },
+      "athlete-development": {
+        "id": "athlete-development",
+        "title": "Athlete Development Program",
+        "description": [
+          "Unleash your potential with a programme designed to nurture talent and elevate performance in sports like badminton, athletics, or marathons."
+        ],
+        "price": {
+          "label": "PRICE",
+          "value": "£POA"
+        },
+        "details": {
+          "label": "WHAT’S INCLUDED",
+          "paragraphs": [
+            "Structured training, personalized nutrition plans, and recovery strategies to help you excel, whether you’re a budding athlete or a seasoned competitor.",
+            "Coaching from experts who’ve trained national and international athletes, tailored to your sport or fitness aspirations."
+          ]
+        },
+        "idealFor": {
+          "label": "IDEAL FOR",
+          "description": "Aspiring and professional athletes seeking to enhance performance and achieve their sporting dreams."
+        }
+      },
+      "team-athlete": {
+        "id": "team-athlete",
+        "title": "Team Athlete Development Program",
+        "description": [
+          "Elevate your team’s performance with coordinated training designed for group success in sports like cricket, kabaddi, or football."
+        ],
+        "price": {
+          "label": "PRICE",
+          "value": "£POA"
+        },
+        "details": {
+          "label": "WHAT’S INCLUDED",
+          "paragraphs": [
+            "Focuses on teamwork, sport-specific drills, and conditioning to boost collective performance and strategy.",
+            "Ideal for local sports clubs, school teams, or corporate teams aiming to dominate in competitive play."
+          ]
+        },
+        "idealFor": {
+          "label": "IDEAL FOR",
+          "description": "Sports teams seeking to improve coordination, strength, and performance in competitive settings."
+        }
+      },
+      "rehabMembership": {
+        "id": "rehab-membership",
+        "title": "Rehab Membership",
+        "description": [
+          "Accelerate your recovery with daily access to state-of-the-art facilities and expert support, perfect for returning to sports or an active lifestyle."
+        ],
+        "price": {
+          "label": "PRICE",
+          "value": "£445/month"
+        },
+        "details": {
+          "label": "WHAT’S INCLUDED",
+          "items": [
+            "Initial physiotherapy assessment to create a personalized recovery plan",
+            "4 one-to-one physiotherapy sessions per month for hands-on treatment",
+            "Weekly soft tissue and manual therapy to relieve pain and improve mobility",
+            "Weekly strength and conditioning sessions to rebuild strength",
+            "Daily access to GoPerform’s world-class facilities, including gym and recovery zones",
+            "Use of specialist equipment like AlterG anti-gravity treadmill, GameReady, Normatec, Compex, and altitude training systems",
+            "Online support for guidance and progress tracking"
+          ]
+        },
+        "idealFor": {
+          "label": "IDEAL FOR",
+          "description": "Individuals recovering from injuries or surgeries, aiming for a full return to sports like cricket, kabaddi, or fitness activities."
+        }
+      },
+      "elevate-program": {
+        "id": "elevate-program",
+        "title": "Elevate Programme",
+        "description": [
+          "Join a community of passionate athletes and fitness enthusiasts with world-class support to achieve your training goals, from cricket pitches to gym floors.",
+          "Tailored training, comprehensive support, and no minimum contract – perfect for Indian athletes and fitness lovers."
+        ],
+        "price": {
+          "label": "PRICE",
+          "value": "£195/month"
+        },
+        "details": {
+          "label": "WHAT’S INCLUDED",
+          "items": [
+            "Individually tailored training programme via our app, designed for your goals",
+            "Unlimited group strength & conditioning sessions with expert coaching",
+            "Unlimited group classes (circuits, boxing, Olympic lifting, mobility & core) to enhance versatility",
+            "Regular performance testing (strength, power, body composition) to track your progress",
+            "50% discount on VO2 Max and Resting Metabolic Rate testing for advanced insights",
+            "1x FREE sports massage per month to aid recovery",
+            "Weekly injury drop-in clinics for immediate support",
+            "Full open gym access to our Performance Centre with cutting-edge equipment",
+            "Nutrition consultancy and support to fuel your performance",
+            "20% discount on physiotherapy, soft tissue, and sports massage treatments",
+            "Access to altitude training system and Alter-G anti-gravity treadmill for elite training",
+            "Full use of recovery equipment (Normatec, GameReady, Theragun) for faster recovery",
+            "GoPerform Training T-shirt to represent our community"
+          ]
+        },
+        "idealFor": {
+          "label": "IDEAL FOR",
+          "description": "Athletes, runners, and fitness enthusiasts, from cricketers to marathon runners, seeking structured support to dominate their goals."
+        },
+        "testimonial": {
+          "label": "TESTIMONIAL",
+          "quote": "GoPerform feels like family! The support has taken my cricket game to new heights.",
+          "author": "Arjun S.",
+          "role": "Amateur Cricketer"
+        }
+      }
+    }
+  }
+}
\ No newline at end of file
